channel.title: Need help [317]
channel.description: hey guys im suign legacy source+client and i just portforwarded and changed ip in client and my friend cant connect and idk where i went wrong any idea my msn is: lja78@hotmail.com plz help me!

item.title: Need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

192.168.1.1, make sure your dynamic ip is right, by doing this run your cmd and your dynamic ip should have a last number so 192.168.1.###, if this doesnt work i suggest maybe your internet is not ment to run servers and make sure your client isnt set to local host!, that could be a problem if you havent fixed look in your egui, or client.java and look for local host if it is set to local host make it your ip, compile, then give to your friend

Read full topic
